Name: The Cruise
About the game: Space-Invader styled stress relieving retro top-down shooter. You will experience a hail storm of bullets while trying to destroy enemy ships. Work with your AI allies and fight through endless waves of different types of enemies. Challenge yourself by beating your own personal record, or comparing it to your friends! A Story Mode is currently in the works, we have decided to use a visual novel type of way to express the story. Other features such as global leaderboards will come soon.
